title: Be My Horde : Welcome To Hell Official Trailer
description: The Welcome to Hell update massively expands the base game by adding a whole new level: Hell itself. Besides the environmental hazards of fire tornadoes, lava ponds, and explosive volcanoes, Moriana will also have six new enemies to contend with, culminating in a showdown with the Lord of the Underworld himself: the Devil. Not to worry, though, the introduction of three new abilities—Frost Nova, Frost Bolt, and Blizzard—will help her keep her cool. This update also introduces the skill tree mechanic, where
